We are Best Company Importing Vehicles From US

Auto4Export is a trademark of Bid N Drive Inc

Who we are?

Auto4Export offers thousands of vehicles for sale online for export directly from any wholesale USA Auto Auction: new, used, salvage cars, motorcycles, trucks, boats, jet skis, ATV's, and construction & industrial equipments.

We have been a licensed used car dealer since 2009, thousands of vehicles sold and a lot of satisfied customers from all over the world: Africa, Middle-East, Europe.. etc

Our licenses

  • Access to the Major US auto auctions
    Copart, IAAI, Manheim, Egde Pipeline, Adesa
  • Fast shipping
    Fast and cheap to Klaipeda
  • Low fees
    The lowest fees on the market will make your car purchase even more profitable
  • No hidden fees
    We do not issue any additional payments after paying for the car
  • Unlimited bids
    No charges applied for the lost auction
  • Free Membership
    Registration on our platform is ABSOLUTELY FREE
  • Access to All major US Auto Auctions at our website: Free Membership
  • Used and damaged cars, heavy duty trucks, motorcycles, boats, ATVs, construction equipment from US auctions and dealerships
  • For regular customers we offer to open direct account at auto auctions under our license
  • Pick up your vehicle from US auto auctions or any places and export it to your country
  • Instant shipping calculator at our website
  • Container and RoRo Shipping

Advantages of using our service

  • We help all our clients in making a suitable choice of the car they would like
  • We take care of all the paperwork related to the legal implementation and documentation of the proceedings
  • We provide access to a wide array of US auto auctions which will give you an extensive variety to choose from
  • We provide discounts and other special offers to all our regular customers
  • We have resources to provide shipping from New York, Atlanta, Los Angeles, Seattle, Texas, Miami, Savannah and Canada
It is hard to find reliable partners who take care of your needs as their own. Auto4Export has an experience in vehicle purchasing as well as domestic and international transportation which is supported by an extensive list of satisfied customers and large number of referrals.
